name: Super Pose Book Vol.1 - ControlNet
description:
Super Pose Book Vol.1

for use with ControlNet

BACKGROUND:

  • This is a pack of 30 poses curated to help you make a pose magazine

  • These poses are made for use with ControlNet and have been tested SFW and NSFW

USAGE RECOMMENDATION:

txt2img Setup:

  • Aspect Ratio 3:2 OR 1152 (h) x 768 (w)

  • Sampling steps 20-50

  • CFG Scale 5-12

  • Sampling Method: Euler A (others work too)

ControlNet Setup:

  • Download ZIP file to computer and extract to a folder

  • Inside you will find the pose file and sample images

  • Inside the automatic1111 webui, enable ControlNet

  • Load pose file into ControlNet, make sure to set preprocessor to "none" and model to "control_sd15_openpose"

  • Weight: 1 | Guidance Strength: 1

  • Click big orange "Generate" button = PROFIT! :)

==========================================

Note: Using different aspect ratios can make the body proportions warped or cropped off screen. This is normal, to avoid this issue make sure the aspect ratio of the txt2img and ControlNet pose image are the same.

ControlNet here: https://github.com/Mikubill/sd-webui-controlnet

ControlNet pretrained models: https://huggingface.co/lllyasviel/ControlNet/tree/main/models

OR smaller file version of same models prepared by theally: https://civitai.com/models/9251/controlnet-pre-trained-models

Put the ControlNet models (.pt, .pth, .ckpt or .safetensors) inside the models/ControlNet folder

==========================================

Please leave me a review or post images of your creations.

If I get good feedback, I will release more volumes. Enjoy!

Check out my channel for other great models: https://civitai.com/user/tokyoidolsafk

The girl in the samples: https://civitai.com/models/13006/gem-gloria-tang-gem

modelVersions.name: Pose Book Vol. 1
modelVersions.description: 30 poses including solo and front/back made for ControlNet. Samples included

meta.prompt: solo,woman, (Gloria Tang Tsz-kei), with long wavy hair, (parted lips,light smile),(shiny skin:1.1), blush, skindentation, 160cm, wearing a grey skirt and shouder less top, sneakers and earrings, looking at the camera, portrait, photo referenced, best quality, ultra high res, (photorealistic), (detailed face and eyes), <lora:GEMTKV11:1>
meta.negativePrompt: paintings, sketches, simple background, (worst quality:2), (low quality:2), (normal quality:2), lowres, normal quality, ((monochrome)), ((grayscale)), skin spots, acnes, skin blemishes, age spot,(tennis racket, holding),(squatting), wrinkled skin, (all fours), (shaded face:1.3), (upside-down,red eyes), (grin:1.25),rope,moon,covered nipples, missing legs, extra legs, mutated hands, fused fingers, (too many fingers), (long neck:1.3),(hat),from behind, watermark,nail polish, multiple hands, ((bra))
